ComicInfo.Summary:
He only has “One Last Shot” as the brand-new story arc starts now!
Superstar artist Brett Booth and Pedro Andreo join best-selling scribe Tim Seeley for Bloodshot’s road to retribution.
Who can one a one-man army trust when everyone’s trying to kill him?
